General.Name: Sterling Tools Limited
General.Description: Sterling Tools Limited manufactures and sells high tensile cold forged fasteners to original equipment manufacturers in India. It offers standard, special, chassis, and engine fasteners, as well as bolts, nuts, and screws. The company also leases immovable property; and manufactures and trades in motor control units. Its products are used in automotive industries, which caters to passenger cars, commercial vehicles, two wheelers, and agri and construction equipment manufacturers. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, South America, and the Middle East. Sterling Tools Limited was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Faridabad, India.
